doc.title: 1992 YTV Achievement Awards
doc.plot: Awards show, celebrating the outstanding achievements of young Canadians. Historical winners and presenters both before and after this show have included Andrea Martin, Right Said Fred, Canadian Governor General Ray Hnatyshyn, "Weird Al" Yankovic, "Tarzan Dan", "PJ Phil" Guerrero, Scott Yaphe, and the Barenaked Ladies.

Awards show, celebrating the outstanding achievements of young Canadians. Historical winners and presenters both before and after this show have included Andrea Martin, Right Said Fred, Canadian Governor General Ray Hnatyshyn, "Weird Al" Yankovic, "Tarzan Dan", "PJ Phil" Guerrero, Scott Yaphe, and the Barenaked Ladies.
